title: Stocks Falter Near Record Highs on Trump Comments, Economic Data
description: The record-breaking advance in US equities paused on Wednesday as mixed economic reports and a flurry of social media posts from President Donald Trump tested risk appetite.
content: The record-breaking advance in US equities paused on Wednesday as mixed economic reports and a flurry of social media posts from President Donald Trump tested risk appetite.
